document.heading: Comprehensive Stormwater Management Enhancement Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-371, the “Comprehensive Stormwater Management Enhancement Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-980 which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 23, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-706 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-371 became effective on March 25, 2009.
